name: Staxel
description: Grow your farm, meet the villagers, and join your friends online in building your world.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2Ghz (or equivalent) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 660 1GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 1GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 12 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
